headline: The Best Warren Buffett Stocks to Buy in 2025
summary: Warren Buffett has generated life-changing returns for Berkshire Hathaway's (NYSE: BRK.A) (NYSE: BRK.B) long-term shareholders.  If you'd like to profit alongside the legendary investor, here are three of Berkshire's best stocks, all of which remain attractive buys today.  Visa (NYSE: V) currently accounts for a modest 1% of Berkshire's nearly $300 million public equity portfolio.
